title: Maintenance works on Sengkang LRT system

title_translations.zh-Hans: 盛港轻轨系统维修工程
title_translations.ms: Kerja penyelenggaraan pada sistem LRT Sengkang

updates.text:
We will be conducting maintenance works on the Sengkang LRT system this Sunday, 9 September 2018.

Train service will be available as usual at all stations, but only in one direction. Service in the opposite direction will start at 5.30pm. https://t.co/pGMEpmSNng
